name: Retail Store Assistant - OV
description: Taken from the Opportunity Village website. Join us at our thrift store volunteers assist with sorting, placing, organizing, and moving donations.  In addition, special projects and events held at the store are posted as they are scheduled.

name: ThreeSquare Meal Prep
description: Three Square is a non-profit organization that serves as Southern Nevada’s only food bank and the area’s largest hunger-relief organization. Established in 2007, their mission is to provide wholesome food to hungry people, while passionately pursuing a hunger-free community. They serve residents of Clark, Lincoln, Nye, and Esmeralda counties. Three Square acts as a central collection and distribution center for donated, rescued, and solicited food and grocery products. They offer various programs such as BackPack for Kids, Senior Hunger, Mobile Pantry, and Kids Cafe to help people in need. You can visit their website to learn more about their programs and how you can help.

name: RMHC Dessert Cooking
description: Taken from RMHC website. Our Cookie Crew has transformed into Desserts n' More!  We encourage not only cookies, but brownies, cupcakes, and anything sweet and delicious.  Bake or make treats for our families in our House kitchen. Determine what you want to make, gather the ingredients, and bring everything to the House to create your tasty sweet treat.  This opportunity is available 11:30am - 2:30pm, subject to availability.  This is a great activity for small groups of up to 5.
